title: How I made Diamond

embed.description: Hey guys, here's a recap video on my personal climb to Diamond ELO and how I did it. If I can do it anyone can guys, it's all about having the right mindset and doing the work.

body: Hey how r ya, here's a vid on how I made diamond and how anyone can do it with the right mind set.

replies.body:
That insight about gold being better on Jax... lightbulb singed my hair.\

EDIT: Brother, I'm inspired to exploit Jax. TY. Can you chuck us an item list? Nothing too comprehensive - no need to explain situational items, etc. Just your favourite build. Thanks, you're a champ.

Hey my man,

I found starting out that a gunblade rush early is extremely user friendly due to it's insane synergy with Jax's hybrid damage. You can trade ALOT and even if you lose out on the trade, you just heal back up fast. 

Gunblade / Tri-Force / Guardian Angel is pretty much the go to build though.
Can Jax be exploited like as a jungler?

I would say he's more consistent as a Jungler if you know what your doing  / how to gank correctly as him. This is because there's a tonne of hard matchups for him top lane with ranged and ap top meta atm.

Yeah, played him into Fiora last night and got fucking rolled.
Got FB, still couldn't beat her once we hit 6.

rough matchup because she counters your stun pretty easy.

Exhaust is better in that match up than ignite is.
